Package gobblin.metadata.provider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatasetAwareMetadataProvider
    Provides dataset-aware GlobalMetadata.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatasetAwareFsMetadataProvider
    Fs based DatasetAwareMetadataProvider which can extract datasetUrn from a given Path, and provide GlobalMetadata for it.
    MetadataAwareFileSystem
    Extends FileSystemInstrumentation and is metadata aware when setting permissions and owners.
    MetadataAwareFileSystem.Factory<S extends ScopeType<S>>  
    PermissionMetadataParser
    Parses permission information from a given GlobalMetadata.
    SimpleConfigMetadataProvider
    Simple implementation of DatasetAwareMetadataProvider, which directly reads global permission from config.
    SimpleMetadataProviderFactory
    Simple DatasetAwareMetadataProviderFactory that uses a user-defined permission and creates SimpleConfigMetadataProvider.
